CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) exceeding 10% have been realized during the last decade , which was benefited from tremendous efforts on the development of advanced donor and / or acceptor materials , device engineering and optimized fabrication processes.

Let's think step by step.

1. Polymer solar cells (PSCs)
2. Advanced donor materials
3. Advanced acceptor materials.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Polymer solar cells (PSCs)
2. Advanced donor materials
3. Advanced acceptor materials.

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material names. The other entities in the paragraph (power conversion efficiency (PCE), tremendous efforts, development, device engineering, optimized fabrication processes) do not refer to specific material names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymer solar cells (PSCs) |
| Advanced donor materials |
| Advanced acceptor materials |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) exceeding 10% have been realized during the last decade , which was benefited from tremendous efforts on the development of advanced donor and / or acceptor materials , device engineering and optimized fabrication processes.

Let's think step by step.

1. Polymer solar cells (PSCs)
2. Power conversion efficiency (PCE)
3. Advanced donor materials
4. Acceptor materials
5. Device engineering
6. Fabrication processes.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. Power conversion efficiency (PCE)
2. Advanced donor materials
3. Acceptor materials.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Power conversion efficiency (PCE) |
| Advanced donor materials |
| Acceptor materials |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) exceeding 10% have been realized during the last decade , which was benefited from tremendous efforts on the development of advanced donor and / or acceptor materials , device engineering and optimized fabrication processes.

Let's think step by step.

1. Polymer solar cells (PSCs)
2. Power conversion efficiency (PCE)
3. Power conversion efficiency exceeding 10%
4. Advanced donor and/or acceptor materials
5. Device engineering
6. Optimized fabrication processes

These entities can be considered as "Property Value" entities as they represent specific values or characteristics of the entities mentioned in the paragraph. In this case, PSCs and the advanced materials, engineering, and processes are the entities, while their respective property values are the power conversion efficiencies and the level of development or optimization.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Power conversion efficiency (PCE)
2. Power conversion efficiency exceeding 10%

These are the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property (power conversion efficiency) in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Power conversion efficiency (PCE) exceeding 10% |
| Power conversion efficiency (PCE) |

These entities represent the values of the material property "power conversion efficiency" in the paragraph.
